title: Emilia S. Löscher
text:
I am a second year Master student at the University of Utrecht in the Netherlands. Currently, I am writing my master thesis under the supervision of Dr. Maarten van Smeden (UMCU), Dr. Kim Luijken (UMCU), and Dr. Ben Van Calster (KU Leuven and LUMC).
Whenever I was given the choice, I decided to focus on medicine related research. I wrote my Bachelor thesis “Comparison of Model Averaging Approaches for Dose-Response Gene Expression Data” at the TU Dortmund under supervision of JProf. Dr. Kirsten Schorning. Furthermore, I aquired basic medical knowledge throughout my Bachelors degree by choosing the minor “Theoretical medicine”.
